content: I see that there have been a couple of discussions on whether the _elements parameter could be used to specify elements to be returned from and extension (https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/_elements.3Dmy-extension-name.20.3F and https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/Search.20_elements) from the second of these discussions @Jens Villadsen submitted a change request to to design a syntax for _elements to address extension elements. Did anything come of this (i.e. is there a way that _elements can return elements from an extension?).

As the resolution reads "Decision has been reached that no change will be made to the specification based on the requested change" I assume that there's not going to be syntax to specify the return of an extension elements for _elements.

Not for this next release, anyhow. Find a server that wants to experiment and try to figure out something that will work and give it a shot. If someone comes forward with a tested proposal, we can consider that for a future release.
In aidbox with first-class extensions, this problem does not exist :)
